According to shape [shp:p], values of property path [def:p] must be instances of class [def:D].

Your node [id:c] currently violates this shape. It has value [id:d] for property path [def:p], but this value is not known to be an instance of [def:D].

[shp:p] https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/model/shp/p
[def:p] https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/model/def/p
[def:D] https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/model/def/D
[id:c]  https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/id/c
[id:d]  https://triplydb.com/Triply/sh/id/d
